body.p: We wish to acknowledge the untimely death of one of the members of our Editorial Advisory Board, Professor Michael Poole. Michael, who died in August 2012, was widely and rightly regarded as a first-class scholar. In a long and meritorious career, he founded the International Journal of Human Resource Management and was instrumental in the development of the teaching of human resource management at the Cardiff Business School. He was not only a leader in the field, but a fine person who will be sorely missed.
